problem_text_cn: 如图,在河两岸分别有A、B两村,现测得A、B、D在一条直线上,A、C、E在一条直线上,BC∥DE,DE=90米,BC=70米,BD=20米,则A、B两村间的距离为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there are two villages A and B on both sides of the river. It is measured that A, B, and D are in a straight line, and A, C, and E are in a straight line. BC ∥ DE, DE = N_0, BC = N_1, BD = N_2, then the distance between the two villages A and B is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是相似三角形的应用,掌握相似三角形的判定定理和性质定理是解题的关键．
